Reviews.Title: “Snow in Rome :)”
Reviews.Author: glogloman
Reviews.Content: girfriend stayed wonderful 4 nights staff friendly helpful nice cleaned day price cheapest hostels own doublebed service level breakfasts absolutely original italiano espresso cappuccino tea delicious fresh croissants italian sweets eat butter jam orange juice packed hotel crispy toasts location noisy close termini station 300 meters underground close colosseum 15 minutes walking spite rome day stay snowing time 26 warm temperature enought heating usual rome air condition heat overall suggest enjoyed grazie arrivederci

Reviews.Title: “Quality place to stay on a budget”
Reviews.Author: Em G
Reviews.Content: hotel aquarium hotel experience friend extremely close roma termini 5 minute walk bathroom clean sheets looked sanitary front desk helpful map restaurant advice free luggage storage checked breakfast nice typical european breakfast consisting croissants rolls jams butter coffee special time saver morning wifi lobby warn people hotel lobby floor ground floor ring buzzer friend girls unsafe stay past 12 night

Reviews.Title: “Average hotel, great location!”
Reviews.Author: Lauren B
Reviews.Content: half travelling europe month summer rome final resting hotel handy minute walk train station warmly dated dingy dark green tiny window wall hardly light morning hear bins collected wasnt negative overall suited sleep night werent using hotel walked except vatican city train breakfast included price looked family school staying time breakfast accomodate ate stay alright bread pastries tea coffee etc service owners doing accomodate phoning taxi airport dont expect fancy hotel people budget explore

Reviews.Title: “Like Family. Best Location. Great staff”
Reviews.Author: Jiany36
Reviews.Content: price hotel amazing talk tony front desk major portion day hell treat family question answered tony hotel cozy close bus terminus includes morning breakfast service book enjoy super exciting trip rome oh tips rome walking youll 3 days dont buy bus tour walk map tony literally walk hotel close vatican 30 min bought bus tour day walked tired catch city bus 1e popular site bus termini bus goes hotel bus goes termini walk termini hotel 2min oh restos ck trip advisor recommendation choose italian food dinning 70 youll excellent restos 14e person oh hotel airport 4 euros bus company called hmm dont name bus stops opposite termini aquariums hotel told tony info inside termini dont wont tell cause train 15 enjoy blast

Reviews.Content: value hotel balconies views roma aquarium personal service breakfast short distance termini walking distance colloseum short distance stops sightseeing buses short hotel terms price beware mother night watchman bit wake

Reviews.Title: “Be Careful of your BELONGINGS ...................................”

Reviews.Content: stayed aquarium 3 days honestly cant address easily hotel 2nd floor worst careful belongings leave day trip luggage broken lost purchased lv bag wallets hide inside own luggage nite luggage true saying goes careful italy thieves happened aquarium hotel own 523 prediction housekeeper

Reviews.Title: “Very very average - you could do much better”
Reviews.Author: BillyandNic
Reviews.Content: hotel location close main station otherwise little recommend loads hotels looked nicer outside basic hotel disappointed stay unpleasant neighbourhood feels little dodgy soundproofing expect awake half night bathroom tiny clean bins emptied 3 days despite strong chemical smell shower hardly move drain properly standing inches water maybe 2 minutes actually shower drain otherwise flood resume shower minutesand repeat process expensive rome dont stay near station anyway

Reviews.Title: “Great prices, convenient to Metro and Train”
Reviews.Author: kiwigal999
Reviews.Content: hotel larger hotel clean staff friendly feel welcome handy metro train station wifi lobby ok breakfast limited luggage space taking bags train station left luggage overall clean quiet stay

Reviews.Title: “Great location, great value.”
Reviews.Author: Jilene
Reviews.Content: pleasant little proximity termini situated quiet street lovely little delightful balcony air conditioning clean bathroom adequate hair dryer supplied requested staff pleased help concierge advice tours checked mega coffee pastries left pay terms luxury friendliness staff priceless

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel!”
Reviews.Author: ieiita
Reviews.Content: stayed aquarium family month 5 nights 2star hotel cleaned changed towels day breakfast pretty staff nice location it´s 1 block termini train station nonstop trains fiumicino hour subways buses stop minutes walk attactions
